Errtel.Name: Absorb Shield - 30%% chance to absorb %d%% Damage as SD
Absorb Life - 30%% chance to absorb %d%% Damage as Life
Bastion - Protection is activated for %d sec. by 50%% chance when SD is below 20%%
Bleeding - A durable effect invoking %d damages to the target with certain chance when attacking
Paralyzing - Chance to decrease target’s Moving Speed and every Healing ability by 90%%
Binding - Immobilize the target by holding its leg with certain chance when attacking
Punish - 30%% chance to inflict Damage (%d%% of target's MAX Life) upon Critical Elemantal Damage
Blinding - Chance to greatly decrease target’s Attack Success Rate by %d%% when attacking
